oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Martha Tennessee Pointer carte-de-visite
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte-de-visite of Martha Tennessee Pointer. She married Monroe Pointer in 1858. Their children died in 1862 and 1863. Mrs. Pointer died in January 1866. The child pictured is believed to be the one who died in 1863 as they appear to be in mourning.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Fort Negley, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
